scripts.e2e-test: export FUNCTIONS_CMD='gcloud functions' && sh test/updateFunctions.sh && BASE_URL="https://$GCP_REGION-$GCLOUD_PROJECT.cloudfunctions.net/" mocha test/*.test.js --timeout=60000 --exit
scripts.test: export FUNCTIONS_CMD='functions-emulator' && sh test/updateFunctions.sh && export BASE_URL="http://localhost:8010/$GCLOUD_PROJECT/$GCF_REGION" && mocha test/*.test.js --timeout=60000 --exit
scripts.system-test: export FUNCTIONS_CMD='functions-emulator' && sh test/updateFunctions.sh && export BASE_URL="http://localhost:8010/$GCLOUD_PROJECT/$GCF_REGION" && mocha test/*.test.js --timeout=60000 --exit
